column2: "Na Filistiafo no faa Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no
column3: na wɔdze fii Ebenezer baa Ashdod."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no faa Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no
column3: na wɔdze baa Dagon ne fie
column4: na wɔdze besii Dagon ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Na adze kyee no a Ashdodfo no soɛɛr anapaatu no
column4: Dagon ahwe daadze ma n’enyim bom famu wɔ EWURADZE n’adakaa no enyim. Na wɔfaa Dagon
column5: na wɔdze no sii ne sibea bio."

column2: "Na adze kyee a wɔsoɛɛr anapaatu no
column4: Dagon ahwe daadze bio ma n’enyim bom famu wɔ EWURADZE n’adakaa no enyim; na Dagon ne tsir na ne nsakum ebien nyina etwitwa gu apondua ase dze no do; na Dagon no kutusin no ara nko na aka."

column3: anaaso obiara a ɔba Dagon fie no
column4: nntsia Dagon n’apondua ase dze no do wɔ Ashdod dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn ne nsa yɛɛ dur wɔ Ashdodfo do
column4: na ɔmaa mpɔmpɔ bobɔɔ hɔn; mekyerɛ Ashdod na no ho nkurow no."

column2: "Na Ashdodfo no hun dɛ ɔtse dɛm no
column4: Israel hɔn Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no nnkɛnye hɛn atsena: osiandɛ ne nsa ayɛ dzen wɔ hɛn
column5: na hɛn nyame Dagon do papa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔsomae ma wokehyiahyiaa Filistiafo mpanyimfo no nyinara ma wɔbaa hɔn nkyɛn
column4: Yɛnyɛ Israel Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no dɛn? Na wobuaa dɛ
column5: Wɔmma wɔnsoa Israel Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no nkɔ Gat. Na wɔsoaa Israel Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no kɔr hɔ."

column4: EWURADZE ne nsa dze ewuwuiwu kɛsenara baa kurow no do: na ɔbobɔɔ kurow no mu mba no

column2: "Nna wɔsomae ma wɔdze Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no kɔr Ekron. Na ɔbaa dɛ Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no dur Ekron no
column3: nna Ekronfo no kekaa mu dɛ
column4: Wɔdze Israel Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no abrɛ hɛn dze rubokuku hɛn na hɛn nkorɔfo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔsomae ma wokehyiahyiaa Filistiafo mpanyimfo
column4: Wɔmma wɔmfa Israel Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no nkɔ n’ananmu bio
column5: amma woeennkuku hɛn na hɛn nkorɔfo: osiandɛ ewuwuiwu kɛsenara baa kurow no nyinara do; na Nyankopɔn ne nsa yɛɛ duduudur wɔ hɔn do."

column3: mpɔmpɔ bobɔɔ hɔn: na kurow no ne ntseamu kɔr sor."
